ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: Brown ground beef with soup mix first, then let cool slightly before wrapping in dough
Separate crescent roll triangles and stretch slightly for easier wrapping
Bake at 375°F for 12-15 minutes until golden brown on all sides
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a quick appetizer that combines ground beef and refrigerated dough. Comfortable with both components?
